name: Pineapple Dodge
description: Its a game about a pineapple and you have to dodge knifes and collect ice cubes to stay fresh.  Its my second game I have created so I'm still quite new to this. This has taken me over 50 hours to make.  Any donations are very appreciated but are not expected, thanks. Join the discord at https://discord.gg/QVwq5c7Z.  Please report any bugs or if you think there is something that can be added please don't be hesitant to ask. Thanks!
